# RL Forever (rlf)

A minimal reinforcement learning package. Simple and forever!

## Installation

```bash
pip install rlf
```

## Quick Start

```python
from rlf import hello_rl_forever, VERSION_INFO

# Say hello
print(hello_rl_forever())
print(VERSION_INFO)
```

## Features

- Minimal and lightweight
- Easy to use
- No complex dependencies
